ReferenceÂ¶

Here is the summary of Decogo modules grouped by packages. There are four packages: model, problem, solver and utility.

Model

decogo.model.block_model

Main module for storing model data

decogo.model.constraints

Stores constraint data

decogo.model.model_decomposer

Performs automatic reformulation of the Pyomo model

decogo.model.input_model_base

Implement base class of general input model

Pyomo MINLP input model

decogo.pyomo_minlp_model.input_model

Implements colgen for pyomo minlp input model

decogo.pyomo_minlp_model.subproblem

Implements and manages all sub-problems

decogo.pyomo_minlp_model.master_problem_base

Implements base class for master problems

decogo.pyomo_minlp_model.nlp_master_problem

Implements NLP master problem

decogo.pyomo_minlp_model.projection_master_problem

Implements projection master problems

Problem

decogo.problem.approx_data

Stores approximation data generated during the solution process

decogo.problem.decomposed_problem

Main module for managing block model and approximation data

decogo.problem.inner_master_problem

Implements inner master problem

decogo.problem.master_problem

Manages inner master problems

Pyomo problem

decogo.pyomo_problem.master_problem_base

Implements base class for master problems

decogo.pyomo_problem.oa_master_problem

Implements OA master problems

decogo.pyomo_problem.nlp_master_problem

Implements NLP master problem

decogo.pyomo_problem.projection_master_problem

Implements projection master problems

decogo.pyomo_problem.pyomo_master_problem

Manages all Pyomo master problems

decogo.pyomo_problem.pyomo_decomposed_problem

Main module for managing block model and approximation data

decogo.pyomo_problem.subproblem

Implements and manages all sub-problems

Solver

decogo.solver.decogo

Main module for running the solution process

decogo.solver.colgen

Class which implements Column Generation

decogo.solver.refactory_colgen

Class which implements Column Generation with user-defined input model

decogo.solver.oa

Implements OA algorithm for convex problems

decogo.solver.results

Stores the results obtained by the solver

decogo.solver.settings

Manages and stores solver settings

Utility

decogo.util.block_vector

Implements sparse and dense block vector data structures
